title: [ICE]: Failed to normalize <bump_str::BumpStr<'_> as rkyv::Archive>::Resolver

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code

```Rust
Code: https://github.com/estuary/rust-ice-rkyv
CI run that shows the error: https://github.com/estuary/rust-ice-rkyv/actions/runs/4027078143/jobs/6922371585
```


### Affected release channels

- [x] Previous Stable
- [X] Current Stable
- [ ] Current Beta
- [ ] Current Nightly

### Rust Version

```Shell
rustc 1.67.0 (fc594f156 2023-01-24)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: fc594f15669680fa70d255faec3ca3fb507c3405
commit-date: 2023-01-24
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.67.0
LLVM version: 15.0.6
```


### Current error output

```Shell
error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:198:90: Failed to normalize <bump_str::BumpStr<'_> as rkyv::Archive>::Resolver, maybe try to call `try_normalize_erasing_regions` instead
```

```Shell
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.67.0 (fc594f156 2023-01-24) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no -C debuginfo=0 -C incremental=[REDACTED] -C link-arg=-fuse-ld=lld

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

query stack during panic:
#0 [mir_drops_elaborated_and_const_checked] elaborating drops for `heap::_::<impl at src/heap.rs:3:17: 3:30>::resolve`
#1 [optimized_mir] optimizing MIR for `heap::_::<impl at src/heap.rs:3:17: 3:30>::resolve`
end of query stack
```


### Anything else?

It happens on 1.66.1 as well: https://github.com/estuary/rust-ice-rkyv/actions/runs/4027078143/jobs/6922371756

and 1.65: https://github.com/estuary/rust-ice-rkyv/actions/runs/4027187247/jobs/6922608688
